sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import Navbar from './Components/Navbar' import Field from './Components/Field' import SwapVerticalCircleOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/SwapVerticalCircleOutlined' import './App.css' function App () { const [location, setLocation] = useState({ from: '', to: '' }) const fromValue = useRef(null) useEffect(() => {}, [location]) function handleChange (evt) { evt.preventDefault() const value = evt.target.value setLocation({ ...location, [evt.target.name]: value }) } const onClickValueChange = event => { const temp = location.from location.from = location.to location.to = temp // console.log(event) } return (
) } export default App
